about_the_game:
《Cage City》 is a top-down, open-world shooter game set in a post-apocalyptic world teeming with zombies and monsters. Combining exploration, survival, and intense combat. You will play as an amnesiac soldier navigating perilous environments, exploring unknown areas, gathering resources, searching for clues, and engaging in life-and-death battles with various creatures.

Open-World Exploration

Dive into a sprawling open-world city, scavenging for supplies to survive while contending with threats from zombies and monsters lurking throughout. Each step of your exploration presents new challenges and unknown dangers, keeping every moment unpredictable and thrilling.

Diverse Weaponry

Choose from a wide range of weapons, including classic guns like pistols, rifles, shotguns, and grenade launchers, as well as advanced weapons like flamethrowers and electromagnetic guns. Customize your weapons to match your fighting style and handle different threats effectively.

Skills and Progression System

Improve your abilities through a skill tree by finding mysterious items and trading currency with statues. Defeat tough enemies to unlock powerful permanent passive skills. As you explore more of the city, your combat skills will grow, making the gameplay more enjoyable.

Trading and Resource Management

Trade collected junk for money or buy essential supplies from vending machines. Manage your resources wisely to handle the changing survival challenges of Cage City and stay alive in this dangerous environment.

Dungeon Adventures

Enter dangerous dungeons filled with hordes of zombies and monsters. Conquer these tough areas to obtain vital resources and discover mysterious items guarded by extremely dangerous creatures. Each dungeon offers unique challenges and rewards, testing your skills to the limit.

Engaging Storyline

Uncover the truth behind the disaster as you explore the city. Face terrifying entities and solve the mystery of Cage City, revealing the secrets that led to the world's downfall and your forgotten past.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be a small amount of bloody scenes when shooting enemies with firearms.
